mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.tech_id AS "techId", t.tech_name as "techName", t.tech_sex as "techSex", t.tech_phone as "techPhone", v.img_url as "imgUrl", a.tech_status AS "techStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join service_technician_info t on a.tech_id = t.id left join service_technician_images v on a.tech_id = v.tech_id left join order_info o on a.order_id = o.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM order_tech_relation a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
and a.order_id like concat('%',#{orderId},'%')
and t.tech_name like concat('%',#{techName},'%')
and t.tech_phone like concat('%',#{techPhone},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_tech_relation( id, order_id, tech_id, tech_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{techId}, #{techStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_tech_relation SET order_id = #{orderId}, tech_id = #{techId}, tech_status = #{techStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
